data.title: What is SiteSearch?
data.content: SiteSearch is a lightweight, customizable search solution for websites. It allows you to add powerful search functionality to any website with minimal setup.
data.author: Philippe Ruaudel

data.title: How to Install SiteSearch
data.content: Installing SiteSearch is simple. Just include the script in your HTML and configure the options according to your needs. No server-side setup required!
data.author: Philippe Ruaudel

data.title: Customizing Search Results
data.content: Learn how to customize the appearance and behavior of search results in SiteSearch. This includes styling, sorting, and filtering options.
data.author: Philippe Ruaudel

data.title: Using SiteSearch with React
data.content: This guide shows you how to integrate SiteSearch with React applications. Learn about component integration and state management.
data.author: Philippe Ruaudel

data.title: SiteSearch Configuration Options
data.content: A comprehensive reference of all configuration options available in SiteSearch. Learn how to fine-tune your search experience.
data.author: Philippe Ruaudel
